sentences.cn: 由专职司机驾驶的黑色豪华加长轿车

sentences.en: For example, chauffeur Pande said he wants his two children to acquire skills that will help them do better jobs than driving.
sentences.cn: 例如，作为司机的潘德说，他希望他的两个孩子能学到技术，让他们找到比司机更好的工作。

sentences.en: He lived in considerable style, travelling widely, usually with a cook, valet, butler and chauffeur in attendance.
sentences.cn: 他活得相当潇洒，通常带着厨师、用人、管家和司机到处游玩。

sentences.en: He served as gardener and as chauffeur.
He wrested the suitcase from the chauffeur.
sentences.cn: 他从司机手里抢过手提箱。

sentences.en: He's volunteered his services as a chauffeur.
His chauffeur-driven car and company mobile phone will be handed on to his successor.
sentences.cn: 他那辆配有专职司机的轿车和公司手机将转交给他的继任者。

sentences.en: His former chauffeur is claiming unfair dismissal on the grounds of racial discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他的前任司机声称自己因为种族歧视而遭到了不公平解雇。

sentences.en: His main job was guarding Dodi, acting as his chauffeur, bodyguard and dogsbody.
sentences.cn: 他的主要工作是保护多迪，当多迪的司机、保镖和勤杂工。

sentences.en: In one driveway a chauffeur wearing rubber boots was hosing down a limousine.
sentences.cn: 其中一条私人车道上，一位穿着橡胶靴的专职司机正用水管冲洗一辆豪华轿车。

sentences.en: In the service of the empress, this inept chauffeur faced no legal sanction for the mishap.
sentences.cn: 由于服侍太后，这位无能的司机在这场车祸中没有受到任何法律的制裁。

sentences.en: It was certainly useful to have her there to chauffeur him around.
sentences.cn: 有她在那儿还是挺有用的，能开车带他到处跑。

sentences.en: Mary, the cook, is walking out with Jack, the chauffeur.
sentences.cn: 厨师玛丽正同汽车司机杰克恋爱.

sentences.en: She has a chauffeur - driven limousine.
sentences.cn: 她有一辆由私人司机开的豪华轿车.

sentences.en: She went out herself and spoke to the chauffeur.
sentences.cn: 她亲自走出去跟汽车司机说话.

sentences.en: The chauffeur got out to crank the motor.
sentences.cn: 司机下车用曲柄去发动汽车。

sentences.en: The chauffeur started up and Marie verified the current.
sentences.cn: 司机开动发电机,玛丽调节电流.

sentences.en: The chauffeur turned the sedan about.

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to drive a car for someone else
to drive a car for someone as your job
